thread.title: EastEnders spoilers: Will Lauren Branning cheat – and can Josh actually be trusted?
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers: Will Lauren Branning cheat – and can Josh actually be trusted?

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: EastEnders spoilers: Will Lauren Branning cheat – and can Josh actually be trusted?
text:
(Picture: BBC) Lauren Branning has found herself tempted to cheat on her boyfriend Steven Beale in EastEnders but is Josh as good as he seems or could he just be part of a set up by Lauren’s scheming dad, Max? 
Bored in her relationship with Steven, Lauren was flattered when Josh gave her his number after she helped him to fix the photocopier and, with her mind returning to him regularly, Lauren has been warned repeatedly by her mate Whitney Carter to stay clear.
Lauren can’t help herself and found herself dragging Whitney to a bar near Max’s offices where she bumped into Josh and invited him for drinks. As the pair flirted up a storm, Whitney mentioned Lauren’s boyfriend and baby but this didn’t deter Josh from giving Lauren his number again – as she had lost it last time – before tenderly kissing her as they parted ways.
(Picture: BBC) Whitney urged Lauren not to throw everything away but Lauren seems to already have made her mind up – so are EastEnders lining up a sordid affair storyline for her which will leave Steven heartbroken? Or will she end up having a change of heart as she learns more about Josh?
After all, some are already speculating how neat it seems that he is on Lauren’s radar when she has been complaining about having a dull relationship with Steven. At the same time, Max has been trying to build bridges with Steven, something which is already suspicious to many given Max’s secret revenge plot to bring down Albert Square.
(Picture: BBC) Might Josh actually be working in cahoots with Max and is he really prepared to use his daughter as a pawn to get his own back?
Or is Josh’s attraction to Lauren purely coincidental and organic?
Whatever happens, things have only just started getting complicated – and someone is bound to get hurt!
